data.text: @nightwaynes I will be watching it literally 48 hours from now, these will be longest hours of my life.
@nightwaynes Happy for Matt Reeves. He put 5 years into it. Well, at least it took 5 years before the release. Some movies are made in 1.5 years. So I expect very refined cinema. Talented filmmaker.
@nightwaynes Man, a man dressed as a bat really can make u emotional, i just watched LEGO batman movie and Batman Forever, love them so much https://t.co/m0FOazQNG4
@nightwaynes Sabrina, dream comes true. I m so happy for u.😊😊
@nightwaynes What a journey it’s been fellas ❤️
I just can’t believe i can say that I’ll be in theaters seeing my emotional support Batman movie tomorrow this feels like a DREAM!!! I can’t stop crying and smiling I’ve never been happier 😭❤️
